papers.title: History’s view of Donald Trump will be determined by decisions made in 2019
papers.desc: He will face bigger constraints and be less buoyed by good fortune in the new year

papers.title: How to alleviate the refugee crisis
papers.desc: Our response to the plight of refugees in the coming year will be the measure of our humanity, writes Angelina Jolie, actor and special envoy of the UNHCR

papers.title: There are no killer robots yet—but regulators must respond to AI in 2019
papers.desc: AI does not need a whole new set of rules. Better to simply adapt and reinforce existing ones

papers.title: What is vaccine-derived polio?
papers.desc: Cases are extremely rare but now outnumber those from the wild polio virus

papers.title: What makes a good period drama?
papers.desc: “Mary Queen of Scots” thinks the answer lies in spectacles and grandiloquent addresses. “The Favourite” opts for domestic intrigues

papers.title: Who are the Ibadis?
papers.desc: They predominate in Oman, which has remained apart from the Islamic infighting that disrupts the Middle East
